name: FPS Project
description:
Currently a very early unfinished set of ideas based around 'First-Person Shooter' mechanics in a physics environment. 

This project has been an ongoing playground for me to test out ideas and features that would not fit into my course assignments, such as rag-doll physics and gun animations. Several features are still in progress such as the build menu, however a test gadget (smoke grenade) can be bought and thrown using the fire button, and several features are experimental, such as the force ability.

Controls:

Mouse1 : Fire current weapon

Mouse 2: Aim

Scroll Wheel: Switch Weapon

Q and E - Peek left and right

R - Reload

C - Crouch

G - Hold to cook grenade, release to throw

H - Slow-Motion (fire at enemies to replenish)

V - Kick physics objects (crates and barrels)

Middle Mouse Button - Hold to use force ability

T - Toggle between pull and push force

F - Interact with monitor to buy gadgets (currently just a smoke grenade)

Y - Switch to gadget if equipped
